pages.text: The $(mob)Myrmex Worker$() is a monster found around $(thing)Myrmex Hives$(). It forages food and resources for its colony, and attacks any intruding player with its bite and a venomous stinger.
All $(mob)Myrmexes$() drop $(item)Myrmex Chitin$() of their respective environment on death. It can be crafted into armor, tools and weapons.

All $(mob)Myrmexes$() also drop $(item)Myrmex Resin$() of their respective environment on death. Dropping it near a $(thing)Myrmex Hive$() and letting $(mob)Myrmex Workers$() forage it will slowly increase the player's reputation towards that $(thing)Myrmex Hives$(), eventually stopping attacks on sight and even allowing trades.

Lastly, all $(mob)Myrmexes$() may also drop a $(item)Myrmex Stinger$() on death. It can be crafted into a $(item)Myrmex Stinger Sword$() or a $(item)Myrmex Staff$(), which can be used to control a $(thing)Myrmex Hive$() as long as the user has enough reputation towards it.
